channel.title: New UA Feats
channel.description: Posts in the discussion thread "New UA Feats" - Feats from the new Draconic Options UA

item.title: Re: New UA Feats
item.content:encoded: These have been added to the main page. Thanks for the quick turnaround

item.title: New UA Feats
item.content:encoded:
Here are the pages I've made for the feats in the new UA. If someone could add them to the homepage under the UA list in the Feats section, that would be greatly appreciated.

http://dnd5e.wikidot.com/feat:gift-of-the-chromatic-dragon-ua
http://dnd5e.wikidot.com/feat:gift-of-the-metallic-dragon-ua
http://dnd5e.wikidot.com/feat:gift-of-the-gem-dragon-ua
